data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Dimapur, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dimapur, Nagaland, India

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 1,495 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Dimapur, Nagaland, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Dimapur, Nagaland, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Aiton people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, guide the church in Dimapur, Nagaland, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Dimapur.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.section_summary:
the county of Dimapur, Nagaland, India has a population of 135,900.

We estimate Dimapur has 1,495 people who might know Jesus, 1,649 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 132,756 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 1,495 believers in Dimapur that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

location.name: Dimapur
location.people_groups_list: Arleng, Biate, Patni (Hindu traditions), Deori, Loi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arleng (497,000), Biate (16,000), Patni (Hindu traditions) (226,000), Deori (52,000), Loi (86,000)
